mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accnut_tax_header( tax_num, from_rgno, from_co_name, from_name, from_address, from_status, from_cate, from_email, to_rgno, to_co_name, to_name, to_address, to_status, to_cate, to_email1, to_email2, rgdate, note, total, supply, tax, company_num ) VALUES ( #{pk}, #{from.bsnNum}, #{from.coName}, #{from.representor}, #{from.address}, #{from.status}, #{from.cate}, #{from.email}, #{to.id}, #{to.name}, #{to.manager}, #{to.address}, #{to.status}, #{to.cate}, #{to.email2}, #{to.email3}, #{total.date}, #{total.note}, #{total.total}, #{total.supply}, #{total.tax}, #{total.companyNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT th.tax_num, th.from_rgno, th.from_co_name, th.from_name, th.from_address, th.from_status, th.from_email, th.to_rgno, th.to_co_name, th.to_name, th.to_address, th.to_status, th.to_cate, th.to_email1, th.to_email2, th.rgdate, th.note, th.total, th.supply, th.tax, td.tax_detail_num, td.month, td.day, td.option_code, td.standard, td.quantity, td.amount, td.total, td.supply_price, td.tax, td.note FROM accnut_tax_header th JOIN accnut_tax_detail td ON (th.tax_num = td.tax_num) WHERE th.tax_num = #{pk}
